name: Video blogger Story
description: In the "Video Blogger Story", you will be able to play the role of a video-blogger, starting from the bottom and finishing at the top of world rates! Your character will become more and more experienced during the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or Equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
